I am a third year statistics PhD candidate in the Department of Mathematics at King's College London. My research focuses on Bayesian methods and computational statistics, including:

-   Bayesian Nonparametrics

-   Time series analysis

-   Change-point detection

-   Monte Carlo methods

-   Particle Filtering
